definitions.definition: an instruction written by a medical practitioner that authorizes a patient to be provided a medicine or treatment.
examples: he scribbled a prescription for tranquilizers
synonyms: authorization; Moreinformalscrip; archaicrecipe "the doctor wrote a prescription"

definitions.definition: the action of prescribing a medicine or treatment.
a medicine or remedy that is prescribed.
examples: I've got to pick up my prescription
synonyms: medication "he fetched the prescription from the drug store"

definitions.definition: a recommendation that is authoritatively put forward.
examples: effective prescriptions for sustaining rural communities

definitions.definition: the authoritative recommendation of an action or procedure.
examples: rather than prescription there would be guidance

definitions.definition: the establishment of a claim founded on the basis of a long or indefinite period of uninterrupted use or of long-standing custom.
